howItWorks.discoverIn1Min: Find out how DisMoi works in 1 minute
howItWorks.modalTitle: How does the DisMoi extension work?

step1.title: I subscribe to the profiles of my choice.
step1.detail: They, and only they, can advise me in my navigation!

step2.title: I browse the web
step2.detail: as usual: e-commerce, media, social networks...

step3.title: I get their advice
step3.detail: directly on the web pages I visit.

contributors.title: +2000 contributions...
contributors.subTitle: that make the web safer, more transparent and more open to alternatives

becomeContributor.title: You too can share your tips and experiences!
becomeContributor.buttonText: Install the extension to become a contributor

card1.title: Respects your privacy
card1.text: The extension does not do any profiling and no data of our users is exploited or resold. The use of the DisMoi extension is anonymous by default.

card2.title: Advertising free
card2.text: DisMoi will never advertise to you. You choose to subscribe to each contributor, or conversely to stop following them if their contributions bother you.

card3.title: Does not slow down your browser
card3.text: Unlike other extensions, DisMoi does not slow down your browser. The impact of the extension on your browsing speed is minimal and imperceptible.

card4.title: Transparent & Open Source
card4.text: The source code is searchable from our open source GitHub repository. Anyone can reuse it freely and contribute to it. Take part in building a free, neutral and open internet.
